definition: variant of 襤褸|褴褛[lan2 lu:3]
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)

sentences.english: Road to see a blind Uncle and a clothing of the past, Flowery cooperating.
sentences.chinese: 路上見到一個盲人大叔和一個衣杉藍縷的大媽。

sentences.english: That is the transformation that they wrought, with each step of their well-worn shoes.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們篳路藍縷，一步一步推動的轉變。
